required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Safety and Efficacy of Estetrol in Healthy Men
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Double-blind, Randomised, Placebo-controlled, Multiple Dose Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Multiple Dosages of Estetrol in Healthy Men

brief_summary.textblock: The current study is designed as a phase Ib multiple dose study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of E4 in healthy men after daily oral administration for 28 days.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with Adverse Events (AEs)
primary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline measurements considered clinically significant by the Investigator will be reported as AEs.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in hormone levels
primary_outcome.description: The serum concentrations of Follicle Stimulating Hormone (FSH), Luteinising Hormone (LH), Estradiol (E2), total testosterone and free testosterone levels (actual values as well as percentage change from pre-dose concentration) will be listed and summarized descriptively by treatment group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in haemostasis parameters
secondary_outcome.description: The relative change in Activated Protein C (APC)-resistance, prothrombin factor 1 + 2, D-dimer, free Tissue Factor Pathway Inhibitor (TFPI), antothrombin activity, protein S activity and angiotensinogen levels and the actual change from baseline will be calculated by treatment group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in lipid parameters
secondary_outcome.description: The relative change in total cholesterol, triglycerides, High Density Lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol, Low Density Lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol, Lipoprotein A (Lp(A)) levels and the actual change from baseline will be calculated by treatment group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in glucose levels
secondary_outcome.description: The relative change in glucose levels and the actual change from baseline will be calculated by treatment group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in bone turnover markers
secondary_outcome.description: The relative change in osteocalcin, type I collagen telopeptide (CTX-1) and parathyroid hormone (PTH) and the actual change from baseline will be calculated by treatment group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in sex-hormone binding globulin (SHBG) levels
secondary_outcome.description: The relative change in SHBG levels and the actual change from baseline will be calculated by treatment group.
Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)

results_reference.citation: Phillips I, Shah SI, Duong T, Abel P, Langley RE. Androgen Deprivation Therapy and the Re-emergence of Parenteral Estrogen in Prostate Cancer. Oncol Hematol Rev. 2014 Spring;10(1):42-47.
Coelingh Bennink HJ, Holinka CF, Diczfalusy E. Estetrol review: profile and potential clinical applications. Climacteric. 2008;11 Suppl 1:47-58. doi: 10.1080/13697130802073425. Review.
